review: Works basically OK. I casted some videos via a Chrome tab and they were OK, except that they don't use the whole screen. I stretched them to fit and the quality was OK, or perhaps just acceptable.I then tried casting some text screens via a Chrome tab and that really showed how much is being lost over the air. The smaller characters were unreadable. Without spending too much time to analyze this $35 product, it appears that the compression is doing this. MP4 videos played to an attached player box were MUCH sharper. So - meh! Neat toy, but I'll continue looking for a better player.
